title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 5-5.2 - Applicability and scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 5-5.2 - Applicability and scope

State Regulations

This Subpart sets the requirements for State approval relating to the formation and operation of water quality treatment districts within New York State. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
5-5.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
